name: The Asteroid Field (BlackFireTiger)
description:
My take on the classic, "Asteroids." Pilot the Titanium Falcon through the asteroid field to take on the onslaught of the imperial dandies. Destroy 20 of their bowtie fighter ships to win!

I hope you enjoy!

  • You might need to click on the game first before it'll register the keyboard controls.
  • If the game’s music isn’t playing, you can play the game and the music together on my website @ https://blackfiretiger.com/the-asteroid-field to hear it while you play; however, the music won’t loop. I’m working with itch.io to find out why the game’s music isn’t playing properly.
